metadata.title: CVE-2018-25014 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: A flaw was found in libwebp in versions before 1.0.1. An unitialized variable is used in function ReadSymbol. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to data confidentiality and integrity as well as system availability.

criterions.comment: libwebp package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.6.1-2ubuntu0.21.04.1').
